name: paintitblack
description: Force text color to black, when appropriate.
author: Robert L. Pyron

preferences.name: autoColor
preferences.title: Automatically color pages on load
preferences.description: Setting this to true may slow loading of some pages.

preferences.name: autoAdjustFontWeight
preferences.title: Automatically adjust font weight
preferences.description: This will have no effect when a normal-weight version of a font is not available.

preferences.name: clampLow
preferences.title: Headers and links: minimum brightness (percentage)
preferences.description: Don't darken headers and links below this level.

preferences.name: clampHigh
preferences.title: Headers and links: maximum brightness (percentage)
preferences.description: Always darken headers and links below this level.
